titles.title: Designating May 26 through 29, 1995, as "Peruvian Institutions in the United States of America Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 11/29/1994--Introduced. Designates May 26 through 29, 1995, as Peruvian Institutions in the United States of America Week.
